techmeme.title: Ilya Sutskever discloses his plans for Safe Superintelligence, says "we mean safe like nuclear safety as opposed to safe as in 'trust and safety'", and more (Ashlee Vance/Bloomberg)
Ilya Sutskever, Daniel Gross, and Daniel Levy announce Safe Superintelligence, an American company "with one goal and one product: a safe superintelligence" (Safe Superintelligence Inc.)
A look at Nvidia's 591,078% rise since its IPO in 1999; long-time investors in Nvidia have had to stomach three annual collapses of 50% or more in the stock (Bloomberg)
Analysis: Perplexity seems to scrape sites using surreptitious methods, ignoring robots.txt, with a Perplexity-tied machine doing so on Wired and other sites (Wired)
Amazon plans to invest €10B to expand cloud and logistics in Germany, including €8.8B by 2026 on AWS, taking its total planned German investment to €17.8B (Reuters)
